item.title: Kennedy Center to close for 2 years for renovations in July, Trump says, after performers' backlash
item.description: President Donald Trump says he will move to close Washington’s Kennedy Center performing arts venue for two years starting in July for construction

item.title: Teenagers charged in Louisiana parade shootings that injured child, 4 others
item.description: The suspects, ages 19 and 15, face charges including attempted murder.

item.title: Police officer killed, another critically wounded in shooting at Georgia hotel
item.description: Gunfire broke out after two officers were dispatched on a call reporting fraud.

item.title: The ranks of US rabbis grow more diverse, with rising numbers of women and LGBTQ people
item.description: Rabbis and rabbinical students in the United States are more diverse than ever

item.title: Iran’s supreme leader warns US that if ‘they start a war, this time it will be a regional war’
item.description: Iran’s supreme leader warns US that if ‘they start a war, this time it will be a regional war’
